ygData.subject: RE: Learning
ygData.msgSnippet: It depends on what you goal is.  if you want to increase your skill, then yes, wear as much INT stuff as you can while practicing.  If you want to fail less
ygData.messageBody:
It depends on what you goal is. if you want to increase your skill, then
yes, wear as much INT stuff as you can while practicing. If you want to
fail less often, then wear as much WIS stuff as you can while practicing.
When you are buying and selling, wear as much CHA stuff as you can.

-----Original Message-----
From: Robert Tortajada [mailto:bobt@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 10:33 PM
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Learning


From: Robert Tortajada <bobt@...>

Is it better to wear + int stuff while practicing? My smith is a shaman so
does
not have a high int. I am curios if I would get more improves if I put on a
whole bunch of +int stuff while practicing

Cerivolk
